column2: University of the West of Scotland
column5: Our MSc Digital Marketing course gives you an opportunity to build a successful career in this fast-growing global sector.With current industry practice in mind, it meets growing demand from companies looking to meet the challenges of a new era of communication and marketing.71% of global businesses plan to increase their investment in digital marketing, compared with 20% looking to increase their offline marketing spend. The surge in demand for digital marketing specialists from companies looking to quickly step up their game in this area has led to a skills shortage within the sector.
